entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • apicompat/tool: log message to explain how to generate suppressions #28083
  • [cli] install exact version of a package #28075
  • Remove obsolete suppressions when re-generating suppression files #28070
    8.0.1xx
  • Preserve xml comments when re-generating the suppression file #28069
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With version17.4.0 preview 3.0 + .net7 rc2 SDK installed on locale OS, some template names are unlocalized after running "dotnet new --list" in CLI . #28068
  • Breaking change in linebreak handling in 7.0 RC1 #28084
  • The DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate throws InvalidProgramException #28063

Closed

  • interactive restore failing in latest net7 sdks #27597
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28062
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Gate warnings for localization asset locales on TFM >= 7 #28060
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • MSBuild on .NET 7: Downgrade compile-time references (#28079) #28090
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild on .NET 7: Downgrade compile-time references #28079
  • Add more mapping tests #28037
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27916
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [Backport] Fix Property Parsing in Publish #28061
  • Fix Property Parsing in Publish #28059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28057
  • Avoid extra copies of dotnet-watch build outputs in the SDK directory #27964
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2000244 #27667
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • [`dotnet-new`] Add inRoot option for AddProjectsToSolutionPostAction #27986
    area: dotnet new
